title: TF: "GUYS I GOT THIS, LOOK AT ALL THE DAMAGE I'M ABOUT TO DO"
body:
http://49.media.tumblr.com/427c2a11b22db9283710de34be65fda2/tumblr_mk3eyezWrc1r88l59o1_500.gif

*An ally has been slain*

Every TF on my team ever.

replies.body: Nah, it's just Riven's shield being OP.
tfw he's too cocky. (tfw=Twisted fate when)

An all has been slain...

WHAT?!

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=57uaOlmK,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-05T21:52:08.638+0000)
>
> An all has been slain...
> 
> WHAT?!

Idk what you're talking about >>
Well you edited now though. XD

> [{quoted}](name=Dunkrius2g,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=57uaOlmK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-05T20:50:37.827+0000)
>
> Where is this from?

La la la Demacia
{{champion:4}} Only two jokers in the deck and I get dealt with you.

I felt this way too about playing TF until I started playing him as a Rageblade adc.

He makes me feel like an adc main.
Was nice to play TF ADC and even when behind the stun card was always useful against the fed yasuo.
had one the other day port under their turret and die while we were waveclearing under ours. wanted tristana to rocket jump into the fight like she was anywhere near him.

> [{quoted}](name=sixdogman,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=57uaOlmK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-02-06T01:39:26.749+0000)
>
> had one the other day port under their turret and die while we were waveclearing under ours. wanted tristana to rocket jump into the fight like she was anywhere near him.

I had one a few games ago tele straight into the enemy team 1v5 and instantly die... he did this twice. And then proceeded to rage at our team lol.
